entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Spiritwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:20 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Spiritwood 2:00 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023
Temperature: -12.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -15.3°C
Wind: ESE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Fog. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating this afternoon then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 05 January 2023
